name: cachet
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a quality that marks someone or something as special and worth respect and admiration: This type of jacket used to have a certain cachet.

Add to word list
a quality of someone or something that makes it especially attractive or admirable: the cachet of the Ivy League schools
